name: Final Draw (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase, by placing 3 counters on this card.
Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can remove 1 counter from this card.
Once, if this card has no counters, the next time you would draw a card(s), do the following instead.
● Add 1 card from your Deck to your hand, but at the start of the End Phase of this turn, you lose the Duel.
